definition: Lantau Island
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
islet
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: What will you do on Lantau Island?
sentences.chinese: 你将会在大屿山做什么？

sentences.english: The approval letter issued by Lands Department for construction of village house in south Lantau.
sentences.chinese: 地政总署批准在南大屿山兴建村屋之批准书。

sentences.english: Other documents to prove the genuine need to access closed roads in south Lantau.
sentences.chinese: 其他文件以证明有实际需要前往大屿山封闭道路。

sentences.english: Earthworks and building works in the Lantau South Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 于南大屿山郊野公园内进行土木工事及建筑工程。

sentences.english: WWF staff investigating pollution in the Tung Chung River on Lantau.
sentences.chinese: 本会职员调查大屿山东涌河的污染情况。

sentences.english: I prayed to the buddha when I visited it with my friends a few days ago.
sentences.chinese: 前几天带朋友游香港其中一站去了大屿山看大佛。

sentences.english: Earthworks and building works wholly in Lantau North Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 于北大屿山郊野公园内进行挖泥工程及建筑工程。

sentences.english: My friend told me that it was built to the north of Lantan Island .
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友告诉我它建在大屿山的北边。

sentences.english: The Lantau Closed Road Permit is non-transferable.
sentences.chinese: 大屿山封闭道路通行许可证不得转让。

sentences.english: The excavation at Man Kok Tsui on Lantau Island in 1958.
sentences.chinese: 图示一九五八年在大屿山万角咀的考古发掘遗址。

sentences.english: This is a New Territories taxi, I can only take you to Tsuen Wan MTR station.
sentences.chinese: 这辆是大屿山的士，我只能送你到东涌地铁站。

sentences.english: The Lantau Closed Road Permit may be revoked at any time.
sentences.chinese: 大屿山封闭道路通行许可证可随时注销作废。

sentences.english: Jardine Ambassadors attend an orientation camp on Lantau Island.
sentences.chinese: 怡和亲善大使参加在大屿山举行的夏日迎新营。

Tsing Ma Bridge (to Hong Kong Airport)

Hong Kong Island

Tsim Sha Tsui, urbanized area in Hong Kong
Coloane, an island of Macao
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong
Cheung Sha Wan (poultry market in Hong Kong)
Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories

definition: Causeway Bay
Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong/abbr. for 維多利亞港|维多利亚港[Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gang3]
